properties.name: camel.jbang.buildTool
properties.description: Build tool to use (Maven or Gradle)

properties.name: camel.jbang.camel-version
properties.description: The version of Apache Camel to use

properties.name: camel.jbang.camelSpringBootVersion
properties.description: To use a custom Camel version when running or export to Spring Boot
properties.label: spring-boot

properties.name: camel.jbang.classpathFiles
properties.description: Additional files to add to classpath (Use commas to separate multiple files).

properties.name: camel.jbang.compileWorkDir
properties.description: Work directory for compiler. Can be used to write compiled classes or other resources.
properties.label: advanced

properties.name: camel.jbang.console
properties.description: Developer console at /q/dev on local HTTP server (port 8080 by default)

properties.name: camel.jbang.dependencies
properties.description: Additional dependencies (Use commas to separate multiple dependencies).

properties.name: camel.jbang.download
properties.description: Whether to allow automatic downloading JAR dependencies (over the internet)

properties.name: camel.jbang.excludes
properties.description: Exclude files by name or pattern (Use commas to separate multiple files)

properties.name: camel.jbang.exportDir
properties.description: Directory where the project will be exported

properties.name: camel.jbang.gav
properties.description: Maven coordinate (groupId:artifactId:version)

properties.name: camel.jbang.gradleWrapper
properties.description: Include Gradle Wrapper files in the exported project

properties.name: camel.jbang.groovyFiles
properties.description: Additional groovy source files to export to src/main/resources/camel-groovy directory (Use commas to separate multiple files)

properties.name: camel.jbang.health
properties.description: Health check at /observe/health on local HTTP server (port 8080 by default)

properties.name: camel.jbang.ignoreLoadingError
properties.description: Whether to ignore route loading and compilation errors (use this with care!)
properties.label: advanced

properties.name: camel.jbang.javaVersion
properties.description: Java version (17 or 21)

properties.name: camel.jbang.jfr
properties.description: Enables Java Flight Recorder saving recording to disk on exit

properties.name: camel.jbang.jfr-profile
properties.description: Java Flight Recorder profile to use (such as default or profile)

properties.name: camel.jbang.jib-maven-plugin-version
properties.description: Version to use for jib-maven-plugin if exporting to camel-main and have Kubernetes enabled (jkube.xxx options)
properties.label: kubernetes

properties.name: camel.jbang.jkube-maven-plugin-version
properties.description: Version to use for jkube-maven-plugin if exporting to camel-main and have Kubernetes enabled (jkube.xxx options)
properties.label: kubernetes

properties.name: camel.jbang.jkubeFiles
properties.description: Resource YAML fragments for Kubernetes using Eclipse JKube tool (Use commas to separate multiple files).
properties.label: kubernetes

properties.name: camel.jbang.kameletsVersion
properties.description: Apache Camel Kamelets version. By default the Kamelets are the same version as Camel.

properties.name: camel.jbang.lazyBean
properties.description: Whether to use lazy bean initialization (can help with complex classloading issues)
properties.label: advanced

properties.name: camel.jbang.localKameletDir
properties.description: Local file directory for loading custom Kamelets

properties.name: camel.jbang.maven-apache-snapshot-enabled
properties.description: Whether downloading JARs from ASF Maven Snapshot repository is enabled
properties.label: maven

properties.name: camel.jbang.maven-central-enabled
properties.description: Whether downloading JARs from Maven Central repository is enabled
properties.label: maven

properties.name: camel.jbang.maven-settings
properties.description: Optional location of Maven settings.xml file to configure servers, repositories, mirrors, and proxies. If set to false, not even the default /.m2/settings.xml will be used.
properties.label: maven

properties.name: camel.jbang.maven-settings-security
properties.description: Optional location of Maven settings-security.xml file to decrypt Maven Settings (settings.xml) file
properties.label: maven

properties.name: camel.jbang.mavenWrapper
properties.description: Include Maven Wrapper files in the exported project

properties.name: camel.jbang.metrics
properties.description: Metrics (Micrometer and Prometheus) at /observe/metrics on local HTTP server (port 8080 by default) when running standalone Camel

properties.name: camel.jbang.openApi
properties.description: File name of open-api spec file (JSON or YAML) to generate routes from the swagger/openapi API spec file.

properties.name: camel.jbang.packageScanJars
properties.description: Whether to automatic package scan JARs for custom Spring or Quarkus beans making them available for Camel JBang
properties.label: advanced

properties.name: camel.jbang.prompt
properties.description: Allow user to type in required parameters in prompt if not present in application
properties.label: advanced

properties.name: camel.jbang.quarkusArtifactId
properties.description: Quarkus Platform Maven artifactId
properties.label: quarkus

properties.name: camel.jbang.quarkusGroupId
properties.description: Quarkus Platform Maven groupId
properties.label: quarkus

properties.name: camel.jbang.quarkusVersion
properties.description: Quarkus Platform version
properties.label: quarkus

properties.name: camel.jbang.repos
properties.description: Additional Maven repositories for download on-demand (Use commas to separate multiple repositories)
properties.label: maven

properties.name: camel.jbang.repositories
properties.description: Additional Maven repositories (Use commas to separate multiple repositories).
properties.label: maven

properties.name: camel.jbang.runtime
properties.description: Which runtime to use (camel-main, spring-boot, quarkus)

properties.name: camel.jbang.scriptFiles
properties.description: Additional shell script files to export to src/main/scripts directory

properties.name: camel.jbang.sourceDir
properties.description: Source directory for dynamically loading Camel file(s) to run. When using this, then files cannot be specified at the same time.
properties.label: advanced

properties.name: camel.jbang.springBootVersion
properties.description: Spring Boot version
properties.label: spring-boot

properties.name: camel.jbang.stub
properties.description: Stubs all the matching endpoint with the given component name or pattern. Multiple names can be separated by comma. (all = everything).

properties.name: camel.jbang.tlsFiles
properties.description: Additional SSL/TLS files to export to src/main/tls directory

properties.name: camel.jbang.verbose
properties.description: Verbose output of startup activity (dependency resolution and downloading
